name: PCKG_AGING
body_snippet:
package pckg_aging is

  -- Author  : Tariq Sarwar
  -- Created : 7/9/2004 10:44:03 AM
  -- Purpose : Store Aging related procedures
  
  -- Public type declarations

PROCEDURE populate_summary_aging(
                           parm_for varchar2 Default 'S', 
                           parm_set_of_book_id   number,
                           parm_starting_year_id number,      
                           parm_aging_template_id number,
                           parm_from_code varchar2,
                           parm_to_code   varchar2,
                           parm_ason_date date,
                           parm_include_unposted_yn number);

                           
PROCEDURE populate_aging_OnDate (
                           parm_for varchar2 Default 'S', 
                           parm_set_of_book_id   number,
                           parm_starting_year_id number,      
                           parm_aging_template_id number,
                           parm_from_code varchar2,
                           parm_to_code   varchar2,
                           parm_ason_date date,
                           parm_incl_UnConfirmYN number,
                           parm_include_unposted_yn number,
                           parm_include_cr_balance_yn number);

Function  Cust_DUE_Balance(
                           parm_set_of_book_id   number,
                           parm_starting_year_id number,      
                           parm_due_Days number,
